mapper.sql: l.id, l.mid, l.pid, IFNULL(l.lname,'null') lname, l.lmac, m.project_id, m.mname, m.mesh_id, IFNULL(ls.x,'null') x, IFNULL(ls.y,'null') y, IFNULL(ls.off,'null') off

choose.when: AND m.uid IN (SELECT u.id FROM f_user_account u INNER JOIN f_user_role r ON u.id=r.user_id WHERE r.role_id in (2,3,4))
AND m.uid IN (SELECT c.uid FROM f_user_customer c WHERE fid=(SELECT fid FROM f_user_customer WHERE uid=#{uid}))

mapper.select: SELECT l.id, l.mid, IFNULL(l.lname,'null') lname, l.lmac, ls.x, ls.y, ls.off, s.id sid, m.project_id, g.id gid, IFNULL(g.gname,'null') gname, p.name, m.mname, m.mesh_id, pl.id pid, pl.pname, IFNULL(sc.scount,0) scount FROM f_light l INNER JOIN f_light_setting ls ON ls.lid=l.id LEFT JOIN f_group g ON g.id=l.gid LEFT JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id=l.mid LEFT JOIN f_scene s ON s.mid=m.id LEFT JOIN f_project p ON p.id=m.project_id LEFT JOIN f_place pl ON pl.id=l.pid LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(1) scount,sid FROM f_light_setting GROUP BY sid) sc ON sc.sid=s.id WHERE l.id=#{id} LIMIT 1

#{id}
SELECT g.id, g.gname label FROM WHERE f_group g INNER JOIN f_mesh m ON m.id = g.mid WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: UPDATE f_light SET lname=#{name},update_date=NOW() WHERE id =#{id}
